title: 初中英语沪教版九年级下册

children.title: Unit 1 Great explorations
Reading “The voyages of Zheng He”
Listening & Speaking “Zhang Qian and the Silk Road; Asking for repetition;Famous explorers"
Grammar "Adverbial clauses of result; too ... to; enough to"
Writing "A famous travel writer"
More practice & Culture corner "Marco Polo ; Ferdinand Magellan"
Study skills "Using reference books: Using directories"
Unit 2 Culture shock
Reading "Living in another country"
Listening & Speaking "A culture quiz; Discussing similarities and differences; A summer camp in China"
Grammar "Adverbial clauses of purpose; Review of adverbial clauses"
Writing "A thank-you email"
More practice & Culture corner "Education in the UK; English around the world"
Unit 3 The environment
Reading "The world  is in danger"
Listening & Speaking "Caring for the environment; Expressing concern; Environmental problems in our city"
Grammar "the same and different; like, the same as and different from; Using the same…as with nouns and phrases"
Writing "A day in the life of Gary Green"
More practice & Culture corner "The journey of a plastic bottle; Your carbon footprint"
Unit 4 Natural disasters
Reading "The great flood"
Listening & Speaking "An asteroid is coming; Expressing feelings; An emergency situation"
Grammar "Using it as the empty subject"
Writing "Helping the homelsee after a typhoon"
More practice & Culture corner "The ice storm; How a typhoon gets its name"
Unit 5 Sport
Reading "Skiing : an unforgettable experience"
Listening & Speaking "Table Tennis Club matches; Asking directions; My favourite sport"
Grammar "Review of tenses; Review of the passive voice"
Writing "My favourite sport"
More practice & Culture corner "Faster, Higher, Stronger; Kung fu"
Study skills：Charts(5): Understanding signs
Unit 6 Caring for your health
Reading "How to lead a balanced life"
Listening & Speaking "How to take care of your eyes; Talking about illness and health; Health and fitness quiz"
Grammar "Using adjectives + that-clauses; Review of object clauses"
Writing "An email to a silk classmate"
More practice & Culture corner "Growing up; The "new"medicine that is old-TCM"
